annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: COMMISSION DECISION
annotations.translation: 委员会决定

annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: of 30 December 2004

annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: amending Decision 2004/666/EC as regards the reintroduction of vaccination in certain parts of Italy affected by low pathogenic avian influenza and extending movement control measures
annotations.translation: 修正关于在受低致病性禽流感影响的意大利某些地区重新引入疫苗接种和扩大流动控制措施的第 2004/666/EC 号决定

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: (notified under document number C(2004) 5541)
annotations.translation: （根据 C(2004) 5541 号文件通知）

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: (Text with EEA relevance)
annotations.translation: （与 EEA 有关的文本）

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体委员会，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《建立欧洲共同体条约》，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Council Directive 89/662/EEC of 11 December 1989 concerning veterinary checks in intra- Community trade with a view to the completion of the internal market (¹), and in particular Article 9(4) thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到 1989 年 12 月 11 日关于为完善内部市场 (¹) 而对共同体内部贸易进行兽医检查的理事会第 89/662/EEC 号指令，特别是其中第 9(4) 条，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Council Directive 90/425/EEC of 26 June 1990 concerning veterinary and zootechnical checks applicable in intra-community trade in certain live animals and products with a view to the completion of the internal market (²), and in particular Article 10(4) thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到1990 年 6 月 26 日理事会第 90/425/EEC 号指令，该指令涉及为完善内部市场 (²) 而对共同体内某些活体动物和产品贸易进行兽医和动物技术检查，特别是其中第 10(4)  条，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Council Directive 92/40/EEC of 19 May 1992 introducing Community measures for the control of avian influenza (³), and in particular Article 16 thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到理事会 1992 年 5 月 19 日第 92/40/EEC 号指令，该指令引入了共同体控制禽流感 (³) 的措施，特别是其中第 16 条，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Council Directive 2002 /99/EC of 16 December 2002 laying down animal health rules governing the production, processing, distribution and introduction of products of animal origin for human consumption (4), and in particular Article 4(1) and (3) and Article 13(3) thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到理事会 2002 年 12 月 16 日第 2002/99/EC 号指令，其中规定了有关供人类消费的动物源性产品的生产、加工、销售和引进的动物卫生规则 (4)，特别是第 4(1) 和 (3) 条以及第 13(3) 条，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas :
annotations.translation: 鉴于：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) Under Commission Decision 2002/975/EC of 12 December 2002 on introducing vaccination to
annotations.translation: (1) 根据委员会 2002 年 12 月 12 日第 2002/975/EC 号决定，该决定涉及将疫苗接种引入

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: movement to supplement the measures to control infections with low pathogenic avian influenza in Italy and on specific control measures (5), a vaccination programme was carried out in parts of Northern Italy control infections with low pathogenic avian influenza strain subtype H7N3. A DIVA strategy was applied by using a heterologous vaccine of H7N1 subtype, which allows differentiation between infected and vaccinated poultry. Since September 2003, no further virus circulation of the field strain has been detected.
annotations.translation: 为了补充意大利控制低致病性禽流感感染的措施和具体的控制措施 (5)，在意大利北部的部分地区开展了疫苗接种计划，以控制低致病性禽流感毒株 H7N3 的感染，采用了 DIVA 战略，使用 H7N1 亚型的异源疫苗，以便区分受感染的家禽和接种疫苗的家禽。自 2003 年 9 月以来，未再发现该野外毒株的病毒传播。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) movement Under Commission Decision 2004/666/EC of 29 September 2004 on introducing vaccination to supplement the measures to control infections with low pathogenic avian influenza in Italy and on specific control measures and repealing 2002/975/EC(6), a new vaccination programme was approved in a smaller area of Italy compared to the previous campaign under Decision 2002/975/EC. That new programme is carried out with a bivalent vaccine containing both avian influenza subtypes H5 and H7. A prohibition intra-Community trade in live poultry and hatching eggs apply in the vaccination area and conditions for intra Community trade in fresh meat originating from vaccinated poultry have been laid down in that Decision. vaccination on
annotations.translation: (2) 根据委员会 2004 年 9 月 29 日关于在意大利引入疫苗接种以补充低致病性禽流感感染控制措施和具体控制措施并废除第 2002/975/EC 号决定 (6) 的第 2004/666/EC 号决定，与根据第 2002/975/EC 号决定开展的上一次活动相比，一项新的疫苗接种计划获准在意大利较小的地区进行。 这项新计划使用含有 H5 和 H7 两种亚型禽流感病毒的二价疫苗。 疫苗接种区内禁止共同体内部活禽和孵化蛋的贸易，该决定还规定了共同体内部源自接种疫苗家禽的鲜肉贸易条件。疫苗接种于

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: Since mid September 2004, there is evidence that low pathogenic avian influenza of the same subtype H7N3 has been reoccurring in the areas of Italy previously affected.
annotations.translation: 自 2004 年 9 月中旬以来，有证据表明，同一亚型 H7N3 低致病性禽流感已经在意大利先前受影响的地区再次发生。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) Although up to present time the infections seem to be contained within a defined area under the restrictions provided for in Decision 2004/666/EC, it appears appropriate to reintroduce vaccination in bordering areas to prevent possible further spread of the disease. In addition, it is appropriate to extend the restrictive measures provided for in that Decision.
annotations.translation: (4) 尽管到目前为止，在第 2004/666/EC 号决定规定的限制下，感染似乎已控制在规定的区域内，但似乎应该在边境地区重新引入疫苗接种，以防止该疾病可能的进一步传播。此外，扩大该决定规定的限制性措施是适当的。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (¹) OJ L 395, 30.12.1989, p. 13. Directive as last amended by Directive 2004/41/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council (OJ L 157, 30.4.2004, p. 33, corrigendum in OJ L 195, 2.6.2004, p. 12).
annotations.translation: (1) OJ L 395，1989 年 12 月 30 日，第 13 页。经欧洲议会和理事会第 2004/41/EC 号指令（OJ L 157，2004 年 4 月 30 日，第 33 页，更正于 OJ L 195，2004 年 6 月 2 日，第 12 页）最后修正的指令。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (²) OJ L 224, 18.8.1990, p. 29. Directive as last amended by Directive 2002/33/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council (OJ L 315, 19.11.2002, p. 14).
annotations.translation: (²) OJ L 224，1990 年 8 月 18 日，第 29 页。经欧洲议会和理事会第 2002/33/EC 号指令（ OJ L 315，2002 年 11 月 19 日，第 14 页）最后修正的指令。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (³) OJ L 167, 22.6.1992, p. 1. Directive as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 806/2003 (OJ L 122, 16.5.2003, p. 1).
annotations.translation: (³) OJ L 167，1992 年 6 月 22 日，第 1 页。经 (EC) 第 806/2003 号指令（OJ L 122，2003 年 5 月 16 日，第 1 页）最后修正的指令。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (5) OJ L 337, 13.12.2002, p. 87. Decision as last amended by Decision 2004/159/EC (OJ L 50, 20.2.2004, p. 63).
annotations.translation: (5) OJ L 337，2002 年 12 月 13 日，第 87 页。经第 2004/159/EC 号决定（OJ L 50，2004 年 2 月 20 日，第 63 页）最后修正的决定。
